Name: Bug Butcher
About the game: Bug butcher is a roguelite action game with random locations, dynamic gameplay and tons of bugs. Embark on a crazy shotgun adventure. You will shoot millions of bugs! In Bug Butcher you will find: - Random roguelike game experience - Brutal bosses - A huge number of bugs
